title: Ticket #7653: condor_wait should read all before deciding to exit
description:
when condor_wait is not told a specific number of jobs to wait for, it currently stops reading the log file and exits as soon as the number of jobs that it is tracking goes to 0.

This means that you cannot use the same .log file for more than a single test run, because a subsequent call to condor_wait will never see submit events that happen after the first set of jobs finishes.

What condor_wait should do instead is read all of the events that currently exist, and then go into a read/poll loop waiting for any incomplete jobs to exit.
